Hello blank fragment

The Applicant consents to the Landlord obtaining credit information on the Applicant from one or more consumer reporting agencies. The Applicant authorizes the reporting agencies and any other person to disclose relevant information about the Applicant to the Landlord. The Applicant consent to the Landlord obtaining reference check from current or previous landlord to confirm rental status and from employer to confirm employment status only. If this application is accepted, the Applicant understands that the above information will also be used and disclosed for responding to emergencies, ensuring the orderly management of the tenancy and complying with legal requirements.
I, the undersigned (called the "Applicant"),offer to rent the above rental unit at the above rent amount as posted by the Landlord.

Credit check purchases are made 
on third-party websites. 
By tapping the company name, 
you will be taken to the company's website 
to join as a group member. 
To join, use the LuckRent 
Membership ID found under My Profile.
Please Download LuckRent App from Apple Store or \nGoogle Play Store and submit your application with \nthe following link:
Subscription

For Digital Inspection to be valid, both the landlord and tenant must sign in person in the app. You can order for move-ins, move-outs, or during tenancy inspections. The photos you take will be date/time stamped, and the resulting PDF will be automatically stored in the document vault and sent to the tenant.

Knowing the market rental rate in the area where the rental property is located is the first step in rental management. Rent Estimation is a data-driven rent report that lets you know the asking rent for your area so you can set the rent accordingly.

Currently, Rent Collection is available only in Canada. Provided by ZumRails and involves an underwriting process and remote ID verification. Once activated, you must add your bank account and request your tenant to activate. CAD prices apply. Tap link for more information.

The Data Import Service allows you 
to restore your data from iCloud, 
Google Drive, and Dropbox. 
Log in with your cloud storage credentials 
to get started.

Digital signature allow you 
to use our templated leases or 
forms to sign electronically. 
The digital contracts are legally 
binding under the 2000 U.S. 
Electronic Signature in Global 
and National Commerce Act (ESIGN) 
and compliant with other Acts

Insurance purchases are made on 
third party websites. 
After tapping on the insurance 
company name, you will be taken 
to the company's webpage 
to explore your options

Hi there, thanks for showing us the beautiful house you have. We are submitting our application with the LuckRent App per your request. Please let me know if you need further information from me. Thank you.
Hi there, thanks for showing us the beautiful house you have. We are submitting with the LuckRent App per your request. Please let me know if you need further information from me. Thank you.
Iorem ipsum is a name for a common type of placeholder text. Also known as filler or dummy text, this is simply text copy that serves to fill a space without actually saying anything meaningful.

Our pricing plan is like a layered cake. The first layer is always free. Landlord: The second layer is $5 per unit, then the third layer is $2.50 per unit and so on. A subscription fee of $5 per month applies if you own 2 units. For a subscription of 4 units, the fee is $12.50 per month.
Select Your Role
How Many Units?
Leases & Exhibits

This app lets you switch between four roles: 
Renter, Landlord, Property Manager,
 and Contractor. 
 
Renter is the default role. 
The default role can be changed in your profile. 
We only require monthly subscriptions 
for landlords and property managers, 
and the first unit is always free. 
By tapping, long tapping, and swiping, 
you can find shortcuts to make 
things more efficient. 
 
It is our pleasure to have you on board."
